title: Universal Instructional Design (UID) Workshop for Improving Remote Education Accessibility

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers; UID (Universal Instructional Design) principle-based practice for science field managers/leaders to address accessibility barriers

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three or more accessibility-enhancing plugins in a Moodle™-based LMS.
Learners can apply the five core principles of Universal Instructional Design (UID) to online science educational materials.
Learners can complete a blended learning design that reflects diverse learner needs through project-based assessment.

resources: Digital Learning Material Templates for Science Subjects

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
